mapper.insert: insert into CRM_COMPANY_STAFF_INFO (STAFF_ID, ID_CARD, CONTACT_NUMBER, NEED_SOCIAL_INS, NEED_HABITATION_INS, NEED_SOCIAL_SERVER, NEED_HABITATION_SERVER) values (#{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needSocialIns,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needHabitationIns,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needSocialServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needHabitationServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select STAFF_ID, ID_CARD, CONTACT_NUMBER, NEED_SOCIAL_INS, NEED_HABITATION_INS, NEED_SOCIAL_SERVER, NEED_HABITATION_SERVER from CRM_COMPANY_STAFF_INFO
